tool_description:
The spoonacular Nutrition, Recipe, and Food API allows you to access over 365,000 recipes and 86,000 food products. Our food ontology and semantic recipe search engine makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language queries, such as "gluten free brownies without sugar" or "low fat vegan cupcakes." You can automatically calculate the nutritional information for any recipe, analyze recipe costs, visualize ingredient lists, find recipes for what's in your fridge, find recipes based on special diets, nutritional requirements, or favorite ingredients, classify recipes into types and cuisines, convert ingredient amounts, or even compute an entire meal plan. With our powerful API, you can create many kinds of food and especially nutrition apps.

Special diets/dietary requirements currently available include: vegan, vegetarian, pescetarian, gluten free, grain free, dairy free, high protein, low sodium, low carb, Paleo, Primal, ketogenic, FODMAP, and Whole 30. We will soon be adding Weight Watcher points, too.
name: Recipe - Food - Nutrition
title: Recipe - Food - Nutrition

api_list.name: Recipe Nutrition by ID Image
api_list.description: Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as an image.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/1082038/nutritionWidget.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/{id}/nutritionWidget.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Recipe Nutrition Label Image
api_list.description: Get a recipe's nutrition label as an image.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.name: Recipe Nutrition by ID Widget
api_list.description: Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as HTML including CSS.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.name: Search All Food
api_list.description: Search all food content with one call. That includes recipes, grocery products, menu items, simple foods (ingredients), and food videos.

api_list.name: Get Meal Plan Day
api_list.description: Retrieve a meal planned day for the given user. The username must be a spoonacular user and the hash must the the user's hash that can be found in his/her account.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the meal planned day in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

optional_parameters.name: hash
optional_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

api_list.name: Compute Ingredient Amount
api_list.description: Compute the amount you need of a certain ingredient for a certain nutritional goal. For example, how much soy milk do you have to drink to get 10 grams of protein?

required_parameters.name: target
required_parameters.description: The target number of the given nutrient.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the ingredient you want the amount for. You can use the Ingredient Search endpoint to get the ingredient id.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The target unit.

api_list.name: Ingredient Search
api_list.description: Search for simple whole foods (e.g. fruits, vegetables, nuts, grains, meat, fish, dairy etc.).

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The partial or full ingredient name.

optional_parameters.name: metaInformation
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return more meta information about the ingredients.

optional_parameters.name: maxFatPercent
optional_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of fat the food can have (between 0 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: minProteinPercent
optional_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of protein the food must have (between 0 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: addChildren
optional_parameters.description: Whether to add children of found foods.

optional_parameters.name: sortDirection
optional_parameters.description: The direction in which to sort. Must be either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

optional_parameters.name: maxCarbsPercent
optional_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of carbs the food can have (between 0 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: minFatPercent
optional_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of fat the food must have (between 0 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: intolerances
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All recipes returned must not contain ingredients that are not suitable for people with the intolerances entered. [See a full list of supported intolerances.](https://spoonacular.com/food-api/docs#Intolerances)

optional_parameters.name: maxProteinPercent
optional_parameters.description: The maximum percentage of protein the food can have (between 0 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by. [See a full list of supported sorting options.](https://spoonacular.com/food-api/docs#Recipe-Sorting-Options)

optional_parameters.name: minCarbsPercent
optional_parameters.description: The minimum percentage of carbs the food must have (between 0 and 100).

api_list.name: Get Meal Plan Week
api_list.description: Retrieve a meal planned week for the given user. The username must be a spoonacular user and the hash must the the user's hash that can be found in his/her account.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

required_parameters.name: start-date
required_parameters.description: The start date of the meal planned week in the format yyyy-mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: hash
optional_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

api_list.name: Conversation Suggests
api_list.description: This endpoint returns suggestions for things the user can say or ask the chat bot.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: A (partial) query from the user. The endpoint will return if it matches topics it can talk about.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of suggestions to return must be in interval [1,25].

api_list.name: Wine Recommendation
api_list.description: Get a specific wine recommendation (concrete product) for a given wine type, e.g. "merlot".

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine to get a specific product recommendation for.

optional_parameters.name: minRating
optional_parameters.description: The minimum rating of the recommended wine between 0 and 1. For example, 0.8 equals 4 out of 5 stars.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of wine recommendations expected.

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: The maximum price of the recommended wine.

api_list.name: Wine Description
api_list.description: Get a simple description of a certain wine, e.g. "malbec", "riesling", or "merlot".

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The name of the wine, e.g. \"malbec\", \"riesling\", or \"merlot\".

api_list.name: Wine Pairing
api_list.description: Find a wine that goes well with a food. Food can be a dish name ("lasagna"), an ingredient name ("salmon"), or a cuisine ("italian").

required_parameters.name: food
required_parameters.description: The food to get a pairing for. This can be a dish (\"steak\"), an ingredient (\"salmon\"), or a cuisine (\"italian\").

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: The maximum price for the specific wine recommendation.

api_list.name: Get Menu Item Information
api_list.description: Get information about a certain menu item.

api_list.name: Get Product Information
api_list.description: Get information about a packaged food product.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the packaged food product.

api_list.name: Get Random Recipes
api_list.description: Find random (popular) recipes.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Tags that the random recipe(s) must adhere to.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of random recipes to be returned. Must be in interval [1,100]. NOTE: Each random recipe returned counts as one request.

optional_parameters.name: limitLicense
optional_parameters.description: Whether the recipes should have an open license that allows for displaying with proper attribution.

api_list.name: Autocomplete Ingredient Search
api_list.description: Autocomplete a search for an ingredient.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query - a partial or full ingredient name.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return, between [1,100]

optional_parameters.name: metaInformation
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return more meta information about the ingredients.

optional_parameters.name: intolerances
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found ingredients must not cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

api_list.name: Get Similar Recipes
api_list.description: Find recipes which are similar to the given one.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the source recipe to which similar recipes should be found.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Recipe Nutrition Label Widget
api_list.description: Get a recipe's nutrition label as an HTML widget.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

optional_parameters.name: defaultCss
optional_parameters.description: Whether the default CSS should be added to the response.

api_list.name: Talk to Chatbot
api_list.description: This endpoint can be used to have a conversation about food with the spoonacular chat bot. Use the chat suggests endpoint to show your user what he or she can say.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The request/question/answer from the user to the chat bot.

optional_parameters.name: contextId
optional_parameters.description: An arbitrary globally unique id for your conversation. The conversation can contain states so you should pass your context id if you want the bot to be able to remember the conversation.

api_list.name: Search Site Content
api_list.description: Search spoonacular's site content. You'll be able to find everything that you could also find using the search suggests on spoonacular.com. This is a suggest API so you can send partial strings as queries.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query to search for. You can also use partial queries such as "spagh" to already find spaghetti recipes, articles, grocery products, and other content.

api_list.name: Image Analysis (URL)
api_list.description: Classify and analyze a food image by a given URL.

api_list.name: Get a Random Food Joke
api_list.description: Get a random joke that includes or is about food.
api_list.code:

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Custom Foods
api_list.description: Search custom foods in a user's account.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of expected results (between 1 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 990).

api_list.name: Get Shopping List
api_list.description: Get the current shopping list for the given user.

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

api_list.name: Get Meal Plan Template
api_list.description: Get information about a meal plan template.

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The shopping list item id.

api_list.name: Get Meal Plan Templates
api_list.description: Get meal plan templates from user or public ones. This documentation is for getting user templates. You can also get public templates. Read more about this [here](https://spoonacular.com/food-api/docs#Get-Meal-Plan-Templates).

required_parameters.name: username
required_parameters.description: The username.

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: The private hash for the username.

api_list.name: Convert Amounts
api_list.description: Convert amounts like "2 cups of flour to grams".

required_parameters.name: ingredientName
required_parameters.description: The ingredient which you want to convert, e.g. the flour in "2.5 cups of flour to grams"

required_parameters.name: targetUnit
required_parameters.description: The unit to which you want to convert, e.g. the grams in "2.5 cups of flour to grams". You can also use "piece", e.g. "3.4 oz tomatoes to piece"

optional_parameters.name: sourceUnit
optional_parameters.description: The unit from which you want to convert, e.g. the cups in "2.5 cups of flour to grams". You can also use "serving" or "piece".

optional_parameters.name: sourceAmount
optional_parameters.description: The amount from which you want to convert, e.g. the 2.5 in "2.5 cups of flour to grams"

api_list.name: Analyze a Recipe Search Query
api_list.description: Parse a recipe search query to find out its intention.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.
required_parameters.default: salmon with fusilli and no nuts

api_list.name: Extract Recipe from Website
api_list.description: Extract recipe data from a recipe blog or Web page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the recipe page.

optional_parameters.name: forceExtraction
optional_parameters.description: If true, the extraction will be triggered no matter whether we know the recipe already. Use that only if information is missing as this operation is slower.

api_list.name: Ingredients by ID
api_list.description: Get a recipe's ingredient list.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/1003464/ingredientWidget.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Autocomplete Recipe Search
api_list.description: Autocomplete a partial input to possible recipe names.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query to be autocompleted.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results between [1,25].

api_list.name: Get Recipe Information Bulk
api_list.description: Get information about multiple recipes at once. That is equivalent of calling the Get Recipe Information endpoint multiple times but is faster. Note that each returned recipe counts as one request.

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of recipe ids.

optional_parameters.name: includeNutrition
optional_parameters.description: Include nutrition data to the recipe information.

api_list.name: Get Recipe Information
api_list.description: Get information about a recipe.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the recipe.

optional_parameters.name: includeNutrition
optional_parameters.description: Include nutrition data to the recipe information. Nutrition data is per serving. If you want the nutrition data for the entire recipe, just multiply by the number of servings.

api_list.name: Search Recipes (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Search recipes in natural language.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The (natural language) recipe search query.

optional_parameters.name: intolerances
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of intolerances. All found recipes must not have ingredients that could cause problems for people with one of the given tolerances. Possible values are: dairy, egg, gluten, peanut, sesame, seafood, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nut, and wheat.

optional_parameters.name: cuisine
optional_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes. One or more (comma separated) of the following: african, chinese, japanese, korean, vietnamese, thai, indian, british, irish, french, italian, mexican, spanish, middle eastern, jewish, american, cajun, southern, greek, german, nordic, eastern european, caribbean, or latin american.

optional_parameters.name: instructionsRequired
optional_parameters.description: Whether the recipes must have instructions.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 900).

optional_parameters.name: limitLicense
optional_parameters.description: Whether the recipes should have an open license that allows for displaying with proper attribution.

optional_parameters.name: excludeIngredients
optional_parameters.description: An comma-separated list of ingredients or ingredient types that must not be contained in the recipes.

optional_parameters.name: diet
optional_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, and vegetarian.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the recipes. One of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return (between 0 and 100).

api_list.name: Search Recipes Complex (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Search through hundreds of thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking. NOTE: Since this method combines three other functionalities, each request counts as 3 requests.

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: The number of results to skip (between 0 and 900).

required_parameters.name: limitLicense
required_parameters.description: Whether the recipes should have an open license that allows for displaying with proper attribution.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number of results to return (between 1 and 100).

optional_parameters.name: maxFat
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of fat the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: maxVitaminK
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of micrograms of Vitamin K the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minPhosphorus
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of phosphorus the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: maxVitaminB6
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of milligrams of Vitamin B6 the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: diet
optional_parameters.description: The diet to which the recipes must be compliant. Possible values are: pescetarian, lacto vegetarian, ovo vegetarian, vegan, paleo, primal, and vegetarian.

optional_parameters.name: minSaturatedFat
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of saturated fat the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: includeIngredients
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that should/must be contained in the recipe.

optional_parameters.name: minAlcohol
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of alcohol the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: cuisine
optional_parameters.description: The cuisine(s) of the recipes. One or more (comma separated) of the following: african, chinese, japanese, korean, vietnamese, thai, indian, british, irish, french, italian, mexican, spanish, middle eastern, jewish, american, cajun, southern, greek, german, nordic, eastern european, caribbean, or latin american.

optional_parameters.name: minSugar
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of sugar the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: minManganese
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of manganese the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: author
optional_parameters.description: The username of the recipe author.

optional_parameters.name: maxAlcohol
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of alcohol the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minFluoride
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of fluoride the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: minVitaminC
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of Vitamin C the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: maxCholine
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of milligrams of choline the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minFat
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of fat the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: maxZinc
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of milligrams of zinc the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minFolicAcid
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of micrograms of folic acid the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: minProtein
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of protein the recipe must have.

api_list.name: Taste by ID
api_list.description:
Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty. These tastes are between 0 and 100 while the spiciness value is in scoville on an open scale of 0 and above.

Every ingredient has each of these values and it is weighted by how much they contribute to the recipe. Spiciness is taking the weight of the spicy ingredient and multiplying it with its scoville amount. Of course, taste is also very personal and it depends on how it is prepared so all of the values should only give you an indication of how the dish tastes.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The recipe id.

optional_parameters.name: normalize
optional_parameters.description: Normalize to the strongest taste.

api_list.name: Search Recipes
api_list.description: Search through thousands of recipes using advanced filtering and ranking. NOTE: Since this method combines searching by query, by ingredients, and by nutrients into one endpoint, each request counts as 3 requests.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The recipe search query.

optional_parameters.name: ignorePantry
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore typical pantry items, such as water, salt, flour, etc.

optional_parameters.name: sortDirection
optional_parameters.description: The direction in which to sort. Must be either 'asc' (ascending) or 'desc' (descending).

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The strategy to sort recipes by. See the [full list of supported sorting options.](https://spoonacular.com/food-api/docs#Recipe-Sorting-Options)

optional_parameters.name: recipeBoxId
optional_parameters.description: The id of the recipe box to which the search should be limited to.

optional_parameters.name: maxReadyTime
optional_parameters.description: The maximum time in minutes it should take to prepare and cook the recipe.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: User defined tags that have to match. The author param has to be set.

optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of milligrams of Vitamin B1 the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of cholesterol the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: fillIngredients
optional_parameters.description: Add information about the used and missing ingredients in each recipe.

optional_parameters.name: maxCarbs
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of carbohydrates the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: maxAlcohol
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of alcohol the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: maxCalcium
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of milligrams of calcium the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minVitaminE
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of milligrams of Vitamin E the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: maxProtein
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of grams of protein the recipe can have.

optional_parameters.name: minSugar
optional_parameters.description: The minimum number of grams of sugar the recipe must have.

optional_parameters.name: maxFolicAcid
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of micrograms of folic acid the recipe can have.

api_list.name: Dish Pairing for Wine
api_list.description: Find a dish that goes well with a given wine.

required_parameters.name: wine
required_parameters.description: The type of wine that should be paired, e.g. \"merlot\", \"riesling\", or \"malbec\".

api_list.name: Image Classification (URL)
api_list.description: Classify a food image.

api_list.name: Quick Answer
api_list.description: Answer a nutrition related natural language question.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The nutrition-related question.
required_parameters.default: How much vitamin c is in 2 apples?

api_list.name: Generate Meal Plan
api_list.description: Generate a meal plan with three meals per day (breakfast, lunch, and dinner).

optional_parameters.name: timeFrame
optional_parameters.description: Either for one 'day' or an entire 'week'.

optional_parameters.name: targetCalories
optional_parameters.description: What is the caloric target for one day? The meal plan generator will try to get as close as possible to that goal.

optional_parameters.name: diet
optional_parameters.description: Enter a diet that the meal plan has to adhere to, e.g. "vegetarian", "vegan", "paleo" etc.

optional_parameters.name: exclude
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of allergens or ingredients that must be excluded.

api_list.name: Get Random Food Trivia
api_list.description: Returns random food trivia.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com/food/trivia/random"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoonacular-recipe-food-nutrition-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return. Must be between 1 and 25.

api_list.name: Get Ingredient Information

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of the food (ingredient).

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: The amount of that food.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit for the given amount.

api_list.name: Search Food Videos
api_list.description: Find recipe and other food related videos.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: The search query.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of the recipe, e.g. one of the following: main course, side dish, dessert, appetizer, salad, bread, breakfast, soup, beverage, sauce, or drink.

optional_parameters.name: minLength
optional_parameters.description: Minimum video length in seconds.

optional_parameters.name: maxLength
optional_parameters.description: Maximum video length in seconds.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results [1,100].

optional_parameters.name: cuisine
optional_parameters.description: The cuisine of the videos, e.g. one of the following: african, chinese, japanese, korean, vietnamese, thai, indian, british, irish, french, italian, mexican, spanish, middle eastern, jewish, american, cajun, southern, greek, german, nordic, eastern european, caribbean, latin american

optional_parameters.name: includeingredients
optional_parameters.description: Ingredients the recipe videos must contain.

optional_parameters.name: excludeingredients
optional_parameters.description: Ingredients the recipe videos must not contain.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The offset in the result set [0,900].

api_list.description: Guess the macro nutrients of a dish given its title.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The title of the dish.

required_parameters.name: query

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to return. Must be between 1 and 25.

api_list.name: Search Recipes by Ingredients
api_list.description: Find recipes that use as many of the given ingredients as possible and have as little as possible missing ingredients. This is a whats in your fridge API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: ingredients
required_parameters.description: A comma-separated list of ingredients that the recipes should contain.

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: The maximal number of recipes to return (default = 5).

optional_parameters.name: limitLicense
optional_parameters.description: Whether to only show recipes with an attribution license.

optional_parameters.name: ignorePantry
optional_parameters.description: Whether to ignore pantry ingredients such as water, salt, flour etc..

optional_parameters.name: ranking
optional_parameters.description: Whether to maximize used ingredients (1) or minimize missing ingredients (2) first.
